name: Lovers of Aether
description: Are you tired of fighting? Lovers of Aether is the game for you! This is a wholesome animal dating simulator set in the world of Rivals of Aether.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Mouse Input
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Mouse Input
